title: Playing Wolf
description: Hunter or hunted? Join twin bounty hunters Ryder and Jayce in their latest adventure, where they’ll have to fight for their very survival. Passion burns up the pages of Book 2 of the Mina Carter’s sizzling series, The Phoenix Prophecy. Twin wolves Ryder and Jayce share everything. Their job, their cars, their women. There's many a woman happy to spend a night or weekend of passion with a couple of handsome bad-boy bounty hunters. But there's one woman they won't touch ... the woman who sets them on fire like no other.When Caitlin crashes through the doors of Honey's bar she sets off a chain reaction that has the twins facing their mother's death, their long lost father and their deepest desires.Life will never be the same again, if they survive.Content M/F/M
author: Mina Carter
